news_items.title: Read the Summer 2025 edition of Hull CC News
news_items.description: The summer 2025 edition of Hull CC News is arriving at homes across the city.

news_items.title: You can now apply for or renew your bus pass online
news_items.description: My bus pass portal is the new way to apply for, renew or replace your older persons or disability bus pass.

news_items.title: New funding to make Hull homes more energy efficient
news_items.description: Millions of pounds worth of funding is available in Hull for eligible households to improve their energy efficiency.

news_items.title: Healthy Holidays Hull is now live
news_items.description: Explore a wide variety of activities designed to inspire and engage children, young people, and families.
